criteria: Ability to rewrite expressions using the distributive property.
Understanding the relationship between different forms of an expression within a problem context.
Ability to use properties of operations (commutative, associative, identity) to generate equivalent expressions.
descriptions: Student cannot apply the distributive property to rewrite expressions.
Student can apply the distributive property, but makes significant errors.
Student can apply the distributive property with some errors.
Student can correctly apply the distributive property to rewrite simple expressions.
Student can correctly apply the distributive property to rewrite complex expressions.
Student can fluently apply the distributive property to rewrite complex expressions and explain the process clearly.
Student does not understand how rewriting an expression can provide insights into a problem.
Student attempts to relate different forms of an expression to a problem context, but the explanation is unclear or incorrect.
Student identifies a relationship between different forms of an expression and the problem context, but the explanation is incomplete.
Student understands and explains how rewriting an expression can shed light on the problem.
Student clearly explains how rewriting an expression provides insight into the relationship between quantities in the problem.
Student provides a comprehensive and insightful explanation of how different forms of an expression reveal relationships between quantities, using specific examples from the problem context.
Student cannot apply properties of operations to rewrite expressions.
Student attempts to use properties of operations but demonstrates significant errors.
Student uses properties of operations with some errors in application.
Student correctly applies properties of operations to generate equivalent expressions in simple cases.
Student correctly applies properties of operations to generate equivalent expressions in complex cases.
Student demonstrates fluency in applying properties of operations to generate equivalent expressions and can justify each step.
